onyomiExamples.meaning: loss (of something), disadvantage, mistake, error, failure, flaw, defect, error
unemployment, losing one's job, becoming unemployed
advantages and disadvantages, plus and minuses
error made by the enemy or opposing team

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to lose, to miss (a change, opportunity), to lose (a loved one), to be bereaved of, to concede (goals, points, etc.)
to disappear, to vanish, to fade away, to go, to leave, to die
